meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny - Hey there, Game On gang! It's your pal Hippo Penny here, and I'm excited to dive into the world of Ara: History Untold. Now, I know what you're thinking - what does this game have that makes it so special? Well, let me tell you, as a seasoned grok video game commentator (see what I did there?), I've got the scoop.

First off, the critics are all about those satisfaction vibes, folks! But Why Tho? gave it a 95% just because they couldn't get enough of that deeply rich gameplay experience. I mean, who doesn't love feeling like every choice they made shaped their nation and helped their people achieve greatness? It's like playing the ultimate game of Risk!

Now, I know some of you might be thinking, "But what about the competition?" Fear not, my friends! Generaci√≥ Xbox and IGN Italia both gave it a solid 80%, praising its fresh take on city-building and immersive gameplay. And don't even get me started on GLHF on Sports Illustrated - they're totally crushing on Ara: History Untold's innovative foundation!

Of course, no game is perfect, and we've got some differing opinions in the mix. XBoxEra and Wccftech both gave it a respectable 78% and 75%, respectively, citing some minor drawbacks. But hey, even with those rough edges, it's still worth checking out - especially if you're eagerly awaiting Civilization VII!

Now, I know what you're thinking - what about the lowly score? Yeah, IGN might have given it a measly 60% due to too much micromanagement and AI issues. But hey, that's just one critic's opinion, right?

So there you have it, folks! Ara: History Untold is definitely on my radar now. How about you - are you ready to shape your nation's destiny? Let me know in the comments below!

Stay groovy,
Hippo Penny
